contentrichtext.text: The [[Bayer designation]] '''Xi Canis Majoris''' (ξ CMa / ξ Canis Majoris) is shared by two [[star system]]s, in the [[constellation]] [[Canis Major]]: * [[Xi1 Canis Majoris|ξ¹ Canis Majoris]] * [[Xi2 Canis Majoris|ξ² Canis Majoris]] They are separated by 0.86° on the sky. ξ¹ Canis Majoris was member of asterism 軍市 (Jūn Shì), ''Market for Soldiers'', ''[[Well (Chinese constellation)|Well]]'' mansion.<ref>{{zh icon}} [http://aeea.nmns.edu.tw/2006/0607/ap060716.html AEEA (Activities of Exhibition and Education in Astronomy) 天文教育資訊網 2006 年 7 月 16 日]</ref> ξ² Canis Majoris was not any member of asterism. ==References== {{reflist}} {{SIA |astronomical objects}} [[Category:Bayer objects|Canis Majoris, Xi]] [[Category:Canis Major (constellation)]]
